taskbody.prereq: Only supports searching across boards. The mobile apps currently search on the active window.

context.p: Use the search field on the menu bar to search for items across all boards.

step.cmd: Type the search terms in the search field.

stepresult.p: The search results are listed in a separate window, grouped by cards, boards and organizations.

step.cmd: Click the item you were looking for, or refine your search if needed. Advanced search operators:

choices.choice: @username or member:<username> - cards assigned to a member.
#label-tag or label:<label-tag> - cards with a certain label.
board:<text-or-id> - cards on a certain board.
due:day, due:week, due:month, due:<number< and due:overdue - cards due in a certain period.
created:day, created:week, created:month, created:<number> - cards created in a certain period.
edited:day, edited:week, edited:month, edited:<number> - cards edited in a certain period.
is:open or is:archived - open or archived cards (by default, both are shown).
is:starred - only cards on starred (favorite) boards.
has:attachments - cards with attachments. Similarly for: description, cover, members, stickers.

step.cmd: If you need to repeat the same search query, you can use the option .
